summary: Luxury home brand website for 'Blockhaus' — Bauhaus-inspired design with red, blue, orange, and white color palette. Products include tufted rugs, tufted pillow cases, tufted mirror rug, and best-selling tufted border mirrors. Layout inspired by yayaandco.com.
architectural_notes: Brand name: Blockhaus — Bauhaus-inspired luxury home brand
Color palette: red, blue, orange, white
Products: tufted rugs, tufted pillow cases, tufted mirror rug, tufted border mirrors (best seller)
Layout reference: yayaandco.com (full-width sections, editorial feel, clean navigation)

existing_features.title: Implement a Bauhaus-inspired design system with a strict color palette of red (#E63329), blue (#1B3F8B), orange (#F47B20), and white (#FFFFFF). Use geometric sans-serif typography (bold uppercase headers, clean body text), strong grid layouts, asymmetric compositions, and minimal ornamentation consistent with Bauhaus principles. Apply this system consistently across all pages.

Build a full-width sticky navigation header with the 'BLOCKHAUS' wordmark logo on the left, navigation links (Home, Products, About, Contact) centered or right-aligned, and a shopping bag/cart icon on the far right. Navigation should be minimal and clean, matching the structural feel of yayaandco.com's header.

Create a large full-width hero section as the homepage opening with an editorial-style layout: a bold headline (e.g., 'CRAFT. FORM. SPACE.'), a short brand tagline, and a prominent CTA button ('SHOP NOW'). Use the generated hero background image as the visual backdrop. The hero should feel editorial and high-fashion similar to yayaandco.com's homepage opening.

Add a 'Best Seller' feature section immediately below the hero, spotlighting the Tufted Border Mirror as the hero product. Display a large product image on one side and product name, short description, price placeholder, and 'SHOP NOW' CTA on the other side. Use a bold color block background (red or blue) for visual impact.

Build a product grid section titled 'OUR COLLECTION' displaying all four product categories: Tufted Rugs, Tufted Pillow Cases, Tufted Mirror Rug, and Tufted Border Mirrors. Each product card should show the product image, product name, a short tagline, and a price placeholder. The grid should be 2x2 on desktop and stack to single column on mobile, styled similarly to yayaandco.com's product grid.

Create a brand story section with a full-width editorial layout — a large background image or color block on one side and brand narrative text on the other. Include the heading 'THE BLOCKHAUS STORY' and copy about the brand's Bauhaus-inspired philosophy, handcrafted quality, and commitment to form and function. Mirror the editorial mid-page content blocks found on yayaandco.com.

Add a full-width marquee/ticker strip (like yayaandco.com) with scrolling text repeating brand phrases such as 'TUFTED BY HAND', 'BAUHAUS INSPIRED', 'LUXURY HOME GOODS', 'BLOCKHAUS'. Style it with a colored background (orange or red) and white bold uppercase text.

Build a footer with the 'BLOCKHAUS' wordmark, short brand description, navigation links (Home, Products, About, Contact), and social media icon placeholders. Include a copyright line at the bottom. Use a dark background (near-black or deep navy) with white text to contrast with the rest of the page.

Build individual product detail pages for each of the four product categories (Tufted Rugs, Tufted Pillow Cases, Tufted Mirror Rug, Tufted Border Mirrors). Each page should include: a large product image gallery area, product name and description, size/variant selectors (placeholder), price placeholder, and an 'ADD TO CART' button. Use the same Bauhaus design system.

Render all generated static image assets from frontend/public/assets/generated throughout the site: hero background on the hero section, product images on product cards and detail pages, and brand story image on the brand story section.

Expand the products data in frontend/src/data/products.ts to include multiple individual products under each category: at least 3 products under Tufted Border Mirrors, at least 3 under Tufted Rugs, and at least 3 under Tufted Pillow Cases (and at least 2 under Tufted Mirror Rug). Each product should have a unique name, description, price, and reference a distinct product image. Update the ProductsPage and any category filtering/display logic to show all individual products per category.

Add a full-width editorial category showcase section on the homepage (Home.tsx), placed immediately below the 'OUR COLLECTION' product grid. The section should display three tall side-by-side panels in a 3-column layout, each panel filling with a large lifestyle/product background image, a bold editorial headline overlaid on the image (e.g., 'DEFINE YOUR SPACE' for Mirrors, 'GROUND YOUR ROOM' for Rugs, 'REST YOUR HEAD' for Pillows), and a minimal outlined CTA button centered in the panel linking to the relevant category. Style the layout consistent with the Bauhaus design system: uppercase bold typography, clean borders, and the brand color palette. This is directly inspired by the uploaded reference image showing three tall image panels with headlines and category buttons.
